column1: I use standard RDS instead of provisioned and the cost reduced to 1/4 565.76 USD. The total cost then is ~6800 USD, I would have keep it at that and negotiate, but since the course capped at 6500 USD, I removed 1 ec2 instance.

* AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
